reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 100/13: DEEMING ORDER (CITY OF HAMILTON)
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. Ontario Regulation 138/10, as it read immediately before this Regulation comes into force, shall be deemed to be and to always have been a by-law passed under section 34 of the Act by the City of Hamilton. O. Reg. 100/13, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Ontario Regulation 138/10, as it read immediately before this Regulation comes into force, shall be deemed to be and to always have been a by-law passed under section 34 of the Act by the City of Hamilton. O. Reg. 100/13, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 100/13, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 100/13, s. 2.
